title: US AI healthcare startup Lotus Health raises $35m series A
description: Despite regulatory challenges, Lotus claims it can serve far more patients than traditional practices.

title: India's Digital Future: Black Swan Summit Highlights AI, FinTech, and InsurTech Innovations
description: The Black Swan Summit India a pivotal conference on AI FinTech and InsurTech commences on Thursday with President Droupadi Murmu and Odisha Chief Minister Mohan Charan Majhi expected to participate The two-day event organized by the Odisha government and GFTN highlights the states ambition to be a driving force in Indias digital evolution

title: Texting and driving? City of Cape Town to use AI cameras to catch you
description: The tech has already been trialled on motorists using Philip Kgosana Drive.

title: ‘Get me out’: Traders dump software stocks as AI fears erupt
description: The anxiety was underscored Tuesday after AI startup Anthropic released a productivity tool for in-house lawyers, sending shares of legal software and publishing firms tumbling.

title: WGS launches AI Readiness Tool in cooperation with Bain & Company
description: Bain & Company, in collaboration with the World Governments Summit (WGS), announced the launch of the AI Readiness Tool, a new platform designed to help government entities assess their preparedness for artificial intelligence and identify practical actions to accelerate adoption and impact.The ..
